title: Process a Homeowners Theft Claim
description: A customer's home was burglarized, and they are filing a claim for stolen items.

tasks.description: Start a new claim and gather initial details, including the police report number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster opens a new claim and records the police report details.

tasks.description: Ask the customer to provide a list of stolen items with their estimated value and any proof of ownership.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster clearly instructs the customer on what documentation is needed.

tasks.description: Once the list is received, review it against the policy's coverage limits and deductible to determine the settlement amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster reviews the submitted documents and calculates the claim payment.
